archiefmat.scope: The register is set up like a ledger with an 'account' for each slave owner. On the left hand page the names and sex of the slaves owned are registered together with the (probable) date of birth and the name of the mother. On the right hand page mutations are recorded: birth, death, purchase, sale, manumission and export. In case of purchase or sale reference is made to the folio no where information regarding the the selling or purchasing party can be found. Increase and decrease of the number of slaves are  recorded in separate columns. Finally it is listed who provided the information regarding mutations. (zie foto's)
archiefmat.notes: 19th century. The registers are set up like ledgers with an 'account' for each slave owner.
